column1: Table #16:  Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under State jurisdiction,
by offense, gender, race, and Hispanic origin, 1999
Contact:  Allen Beck or Paige Harrison
Table 16. Estimated number of sentenced prisoners under State jurisdiction,
by offense, gender, race, and Hispanic origin, 1999
Note: Data are for inmates with a sentence of more than 1 year
under the jursidiction of State correctional authorities. The
number of inmates by offense were estimated using the 1997
Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities and rounded
b/Includes weapons, drunk driving, court offenses, commercialized
vice, morals and decency charges, liquor law violations, and other
c/Includes juvenile offenses and unspecified felonies.
